explore

Source: R/explore.R
explore.Rd

shiny small app to explore a targeter object.

Usage

explore(
  object,
  summary_object = NULL,
  metadata = NULL,
  display = c("dialog", "browser"),
  ...
)

Arguments

object

a targeter object

summary_object

optional: pre-computed summary object (see summary.targeter), Default: NULL

metadata

optional: metadata to use to display variables labels, default: NULL

display

character, one of 'dialog', 'browser': how to open the shiny app/gadget (default: dialog)

...

additional parameters to be used by summary.targeter function (when no summary object are passed)

Value

NULL (side effect: open gadget)

See also

report

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
if (interactive()) {
  x <- targeter(adult, target = "ABOVE50K")
  explore(x)
}
} # }
